      • persistGame

        public boolean persistGame(Game gameToPersist,
                           boolean propagate)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called once at creation of the Game on the ApplicationServer. Be careful when you call this multiple times! The previous Game will be updated and Players will keep the cards of the previous init call!
